titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of the reversionary interest of the United States in certain lands to the Clint Independent School District and the Fabens Independent School District.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 6/16/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of State to release the United States' reversionary interest in a 40-acre tract of land provided that the Clint Independent School District and the Fabens Independent School District in Texas used any proceeds received from the land for public educational purposes.
